participant_1.background:
I used to want to serve my country, but now I'm happily employed at a bank.
i like to cook.
i can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog.
i like to do crafts.
i enjoy electronic music.

participant_2.background:
I love to listen to pop music to cheer myself up when I'm feeling down.
i love the outdoors.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.
I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want.
I don't really care for social media, I'm more interested in getting to know the people in my new city.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I'm trying to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that. I know anxiety can be a real challenge, but I'm sure you can do it!
Thank you! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to be outdoors. I love hiking, camping, and fishing. I also love to listen to pop music to cheer myself up when I'm feeling down.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook, do crafts, and listen to electronic music.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to cook. I love crafts too!
I'm sure you'd be great at it! What kind of crafts do you like to do?
I like to make jewelry, paint, and scrapbook.
Those are all really cool crafts! I'm not very crafty, but I admire people who are.
Thanks! I'm glad you like them.
Me too! It sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm sure we'll be good friends.
